name: Beach Volleyball
description:
Set in beautiful beach surroundings with crashing waves and palm trees Beach Volleyball is simple fun. Touch or tilt your way to glory!

- choose one of 3 difficulty levels
- choose male or female player
- choose touch or accelerometer play
- 3D ball motion
- realistic shadows
- animated ocean waves
- vertical or horizontal play
- sit back and watch self playing mode
- listen to your own music during play

Fun in the sun!

Beach Volleyball is developed by RESETgame.
